Admin

1. Manage Users

  • Create new user account.
  • Edit user account.
  • Delete user account

2. Manage Courses

Teacher

1. Manage Questions

  • Create new question.
  • Edit question.
  • Delete question.

2. Manage Tests

  • View Test Details.
  • View Test Questions.
  • View of Students.
  • Download excel sheet of results.
  • Graphical representation of results.

3. Create New Tests

  • Create new test
    1. Enter basic test details
    2. Random Questions or Select Questions
  • View basic test info
    1. Create Registration link.
    2. Stop Registration.
    3. Reload.
    4. Start Test.
    5. End Test.

1. Manage Users

  • Edit user account.
  • Delete user account

  • Create new course.
  • Update course name.
